akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3905. Disenrollment Members of the Auxiliary may be disenrolled pursuant to applicable regulations. (Aug. 4, 1949, ch. 393, 63 Stat. 555, § 824; renumbered § 3905, Pub. L. 115–282, title I, § 119(b), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4236.)
Historical and Revision NotesExperience has shown that it is desirable to have a statute definitely providing for separation of Auxiliarists from the organization. 81st Congress, House Report No. 557.
Editorial Notes Amendments2018—Pub. L. 115–282 renumbered section 824 of this title as this section.
